The Hector Hodler Library is one of the largest Esperanto libraries, with 
approximately 30,000 books, with periodicals, manuscripts, photos, music, and 
other collections. It occupies three rooms in the central office of the Universal 
Esperanto Association in Rotterdam, Netherlands. ... Wikimedia Commons has 
media related to Biblioteko Hector Hodler.
